name: Path of Sacrifice (itch)
description:
Path of sacrifice is a 2D side-scroller platform. Inspired by a story of norse mythology, the player impersonates Hermod, son of Odin and Frigg, in his mission to save his brother Baldur from Helheim, meeting legendary creatures and locations. 

Each level will challenge the player ability and adaptation, when the player passes one of the levels, he/she will lose one ability, making it more difficult to deal with incoming stages. 

 

Path of Sacrifice is a platform game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:
